definition: serving as an essential component, crested thick-billed North American finch having bright red plumage in the male
details:
adjective
- serving as an essential component
= example: serving as an essential component
= synonyms: central
- being or denoting a numerical quantity but not order
= example: being or denoting a numerical quantity but not order
noun
- crested thick-billed North American finch having bright red plumage in the male
= synonyms: cardinal grosbeak
- a variable color averaging a vivid red
= synonyms: carmine
- (Roman Catholic Church) one of a group of more than 100 prominent bishops in the Sacred College who advise the Pope and elect new Popes
- the number of elements in a mathematical set
= synonyms: cardinal number
